title: Separate Ways
lyrics: I see a change is coming to our livesIt's not the same as it used to beAnd it's not too late to realise our mistakeWe're just not right for each otherLove has slipped away left us only friendsWe almost seem like strangersAll that's left between us are the memories we sharedOf times we thought we cared for each otherThere's nothing left to do but go our separate waysAnd pick up all the pieces left behind usAnd maybe someday, somewhere along the wayAnother love will find usSome day when she's older, maybe she will understandWhy her mom and dad are not togetherThe tears that she will cry when I have to say goodbyeWill tear at my heart foreverThere's nothing left to do but go our separate waysAnd pick up all the pieces left behind usAnd maybe someday, somewhere along the wayAnother love will find us
